fullplot: A sixty-something woman, faced with the discovery of a heinous family crime and in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease, finds strength and purpose when she enrolls in a poetry class.
plot: A sixty-something woman, faced with the discovery of a heinous family crime and in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease, finds strength and purpose when she enrolls in a poetry class.
title: Poetry

tomatoes.consensus: Poetry is an absorbing, poignant drama because it offers no easy answers to its complex central conflict.
